statement:
[**Theorem**]{} Let $M$ be a smooth simply connected, closed 4-
manifold. If the bilinear form induced on
$H_2(M;{\mbox{\boldmath $Z$}})$ by the cup product is positive definite,
then it may be represented by the identity matrix.

One application is the existence of exotic ${\mbox{\boldmath $R$}}^4$’s.
See Donaldson Freedman exotic R4.
